description:
Do you want to quit smoking in your sleep? But maybe you've tried hypnosis in the past, or are worried that there are hidden messages?

This course will guide you to make your own self hypnosis audio. You'll know exactly what's in it.

After an introduction, the course covers everything you need to know about hypnosis.

You'll discover:

  • Hypnosis is a natural process, guiding your mind and body to achieve your desires
  • How to talk like a Hypnotist so that you get results fast.
  • Why your senses help induce Hypnosis
  • Embedded commands to help you relax

The next part covers how to use free software to create a perfect audio.

You'll learn:

  • How to make backing tracks fit the length of your speech
  • Good use of panning audio
  • How to create binaural beats for free
  • So much more

This course includes many soothing sounds that are perfect for you to use as backing for your audio, saving you a lot of time and money.

You need this course to be a better you.

Or you can use your the knowledge you gain in this course to create the perfect gift for a loved one that needs a little help.
title: Quit Smoking and Save More - Perfect self hypnosis
